name: Confederation of employers of Ukraine
goal:
The main goal of the Confederation is representation and protections of the interests of it’s members (employers and theirs associations) in the economic, social, labor and other relations across Ukraine and all over the world.

Our mission is:
to represent and protect the interests of investors in Ukraine and worldwide;
to set up effective and equal cooperation between the business community, the government and trade unions;
to establish best business practices in Ukraine;
to implement their own projects and initiatives promoting ethical and legal standards of doing business in Ukraine.

The Confederation functions on the principles of legality, freedom of participation, equality of its members, independence, self-governance and responsibility of the obligations undertaken.
interests: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs
